name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Topic
List
description: Topic::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more topics that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Project#topics to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more topics that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Project#topics to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there a next page of topics.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

topics = pubsub.topics
if topics.next?
  next_topics = topics.next
end

require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

topics = pubsub.topics
if topics.next?
  next_topics = topics.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves remaining results by repeatedly invoking #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each result, which is passed as the argument to the block.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method will make repeated API calls until all remaining results are retrieved. (Unlike #each, for example, which merely iterates over the results returned by a single API call.) Use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each topic by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

topics = pubsub.topics
topics.all do |topic|
  puts topic.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

topics = pubsub.topics
all_names = topics.all.map do |topic|
  topic.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

topics = pubsub.topics
topics.all(request_limit: 10) do |topic|
  puts topic.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all topics. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each topic.
